column4: mp4 files won't play in Firefox - I've just installed a couple packages, xine and mplayer-plugins... still no luck.
add deb http://medibuntu.sos-sts.com/repo/ edgy free non-free to your /etc/apt/sources.list
it aint official as it " PLF REPOSITORY (Unsupported.  May contain illegal packages.  Use at own risk"
how do I get the key for that repo?
i dont know it isnt necessary
I got a message saying the public key isn't available
it aint mine and many people use it and they dont have the server power like archive.ubuntu.com
I'm thinking of giving Automatix a shot
thanks for your help so far.
